_comment: Created by EFisher on 26/03/2014 17:13:45 using v2.1
title: Do people feel supported to manage their long-term condition(s)?
analysis_commentary:
In the 2012/2013 GP patient survey when asked 'In the last 6 months, have you had enough support from local services or organisations (not just health services) to help you to manage your long-term health condition(s)?' the majority of patients responded positively: 40% said 'yes, definitely' and 24% 'yes, to some extent'. Overall, this proportion has increased from 2009/2010).

However, despite this there were still at least 1 in 10 patients (12%) stating that they didn't feel supported by any organisation to manage their long-term condition(s) in 2012/13.

The initial results between January 2013 and September 2013 indicate no change in these results and trends.
